entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -39.8°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
